data.title: NetSuite
data.meta_description:
NetSuite | 446,272 followers on LinkedIn. Business Grows Here | Founded in 1998, Oracle NetSuite is the world‚Äôs first cloud company. For more than 25 years, NetSuite has helped businesses gain the visibility, control and agility to build and grow a successful business. 

First focused on financials and ERP, we now provide an integrated system that also includes inventory management, HR, professional services automation and omnichannel commerce, used by more than 38,000 customers in 219 countries and dependent territories.
